DOC.detailed_description: We recruit 35 non-smokers 30 adult smoker smoke > 15 cigarettes/day two year 18-55 year old . We expect half female . All participant screen drug abuse female participant receive pregnancy test . Each smoker participate four tDCS session , one sham three real tDCS , one set electrode montage . The first set dorsal lateral prefrontal cortex ( i.e. , F3 F4 10/20 EEG system ) neck . The second set middle line prefrontal cortex ( Fz ) , superior parietal cortex ( Pz ) , bilateral inferior temporal cortex ( T3 T4 ) . The third set leave dorsal lateral prefrontal cortex ( F3 ) superior parietal cortex ( P1 ) , right inferior temporal cortex ( T4 ) . The sequence real sham tDCS counterbalance among participant . Each session last 20 minute minimum 48 hour two session . Participants require abstinent cigarette smoke overnight minimum 10 hour arrive lab around 8:30 AM tDCS session . After arrival , participant provide breath sample detection alcohol system , assay CO verification abstinence cigarette smoking . We place nicotine patch ( Nicoderm 21 mg nicotine ) back participant . We also ask participant chew nicotine gum ( Nicorette gum 4 mg nicotine ) 30 minute . The participant perform battery computerized task include N-Back working memory task , attention task involve watch computer screen press button indicate odd even number display screen . In addition participant complete follow questionnaire related mood , nicotine withdrawal , mental state , possible side effect , cigarette craving : Profile Mood States ( McNair et al 1971 ) , Shiffman-Jarvik Withdrawal Scales ( Shiffman & Jarvik 1976 ) , Urge To Smoke ( Jarvik et al 2000 ) , tDCS side effect questionnaire , Wisconsin Smoking Withdrawal Scale ( Welsch 1999 ) , Perceived Stress Scale ( Cohen 1983 ) , Spielberger State/Trait Anxiety Questionnaire ( Spielberger 1970 ) . Each participant repeat battery cognitive task questionnaire tDCS . Then instruct smoke one cigarette second battery tasks/questionnaires , repeat second battery questionnaire cigarette smoking .
